question: ‘Super Hornet fighter jet’, which was seen in the news recently, is developed by which manufacturer?
explanation:
American aircraft manufacturer Boeing announced that its F/A-18 Super Hornet fighter jet has successfully performed the ski-jump.
The F/A-18 Block III Super Hornet jets demonstrated compatibility with Indian aircraft carriers. Indian Navy at present has one carrier named INS Vikramaditya and one upcoming carrier INS Vikrant.
